actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the use of ethanol in reducing air pollution, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to air pollution control

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) the Environmental Protection Agency should provide assistance to cities identified as nonattainment areas in their efforts to deal with ozone and carbon monoxide pollution; and (2) the Nation's agricultural, mechanical, and environment scientists should expand research on the use of ethanol for reducing pollution and the use of imported oil.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the use of ethanol in reducing air pollution, and for other purposes.
